title: It's a Caddy-lack! Bizarre moment a golf cart is spotted driving along a busy highway in Florida
text:
This is the bizarre moment when a golf cart is filmed driving on a highway in Florida.

The electric powered vehicle, with two golfers on board was in the middle lane of a five-lane highway near the Miami Airport junction.

It is not known why the golf cart was on the busy roadway.

On a full charge, a golf cart is able to travel approximately 25 miles, although they are not designed to be used on the public highway.

There are two large golf courses near the outer perimeter of the airport complex - although they are almost five miles apart when travelling by road.

The golf cart was filmed as it drove along the highway near Miami airport in Florida
description: The electric powered vehicle, with two golfers on board was in the middle lane of a five-lane highway near the Miami Airport junction.
